Texts.Chs: 仔细的实验表明，不仅^green;物理定律^reset;在这个新的宇宙中完全独一无二地运作，而且我们能够^orange;直接影响^reset;这些力量，而不需要任何形式的^red;奇迹援助^reset;！潜在的用途是如此的充满希望！
Texts.Eng: Careful experimentation reveals that not only do ^green;the laws of physics^reset; operate completely uniquely in this new universe, but also that we are able to ^orange;directly influence^reset; these forces without the need for any sort of ^red;thaumaturgical^reset; aid! The potential uses are terrifyingly promising!
